title: How to Automatically Request Reviews with NiceJob
description: Automatically text customers after every job asking for a Google review. More reviews = more customers.
requirements: A credit card for the subscription

steps.title: Sign up for NiceJob
steps.description: Go to nicejob.com and start a free trial.
substeps: Enter your business name and email

steps.title: Connect your Google Business Profile
steps.description: This lets NiceJob send customers directly to your Google review page.
substeps: Sign in with your Google account
steps.tip: Make sure you're signing in with the Google account that owns your Business Profile.

steps.title: Set up your review request message
steps.description: This is the text message customers will receive after a job.
substeps: Click on the default review request campaign
Customize the message to sound like you
steps.tip: Example: 'Hey [NAME]! Thanks for choosing [BUSINESS]. If you have a minute, a Google review would mean the world to us: [LINK]'

steps.title: Choose when to send requests
steps.description: Decide how soon after a job the request goes out.
substeps: Set it to 1-2 hours after job completion
This catches customers while the experience is fresh

steps.title: Add your first customer
steps.description: Test it with a recent customer or yourself.
substeps: Enter a name and phone number

successMessage: Every completed job will now trigger an automatic review request. Most businesses see their review count double within 3 months!
proTips: The best time to ask for a review is right after you've made the customer happy
Follow up texts (NiceJob sends them automatically) can double your response rate
